医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
SGLT2 抑制剂卡格列净可改善糖尿病患者的肾氧合2 型糖尿病可导致糖尿病肾病，但一类导致肾脏通过尿液去除葡萄糖的药物已引起人们的关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/SGLT2-inhibitor-canagliflozin-shown-to-improve-kidney-oxygenation-in-diabetes-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/SGLT2-inhibitor-canagliflozin-shown-to-improve-kidney-oxygenation-in-diabetes-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=015db0e0-0ea2-48f7-9c03-e71515a10937 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:58:59 -0500 SGLT2 inhibitor canagliflozin shown to improve kidney oxygenation in diabetes patients
非甾体抗炎药会增加服用血液稀释剂的患者的出血风险根据《欧洲心脏杂志》发表的研究，服用抗凝药物的人如果服用布洛芬、双氯芬酸或萘普生等非甾体抗炎药 (NSAID) 止痛药，内出血的风险会增加一倍。 1]今天（星期一）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/NSAIDs-raise-bleeding-risk-in-病人-take-blood-thinners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/NSAIDs-raise-bleeding-risk-in-病人-take-blood-thinners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2cf4eb6-f5d3-4350-a2a7-bfe842e1917d Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:47:11 -0500 NSAIDs raise bleeding risk in patients taking blood thinners
激素疗法和青春期阻滞剂改变跨性别者的骨骼大小根据在利物浦举行的第 62 届欧洲儿科内分泌学会年度会议上发表的研究，只有在青春期期间青春期也受到抑制的情况下，性别肯定激素疗法才可能改变骨骼大小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Hormone-therapy-and-puberty-blockers-alter-skeletal-size-in-transgender-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Hormone-therapy-and-puberty-blockers-alter-skeletal-size-in-transgender-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=338d3894-e822-4a91-86b0-0e0a8bb47c10 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:31:11 -0500 Hormone therapy and puberty blockers alter skeletal size in transgender individuals
男孩青春期延迟可能会导致未来新的后续医疗保健常规根据在利物浦举行的第 62 届欧洲儿科内分泌学会年度会议上发表的研究，在青春期经历青春期晚期的瑞典年轻男性更有可能在以后的生活中使用医疗服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Delayed-puberty-in-boys-could-lead-to-new-follow-up-healthcare-routines-in-the-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Delayed-puberty-in-boys-could-lead-to-new-follow-up-healthcare-routines-in-the-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f13ca328-a704-4985-a2cc-f9f332f207d3 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:27:17 -0500 Delayed puberty in boys could lead to new follow-up healthcare routines in the future
AI算法准确检测早期代谢相关脂肪肝病肝病在早期发现时是可以治疗的，但往往直到晚期才被发现，但一项新的研究表明，人工智能驱动的算法可以通过使用电子健康记录准确检测早期代谢相关脂肪肝病（MASLD）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/AI-algorithm-accurately-detects-early-stage-metabolic-linked-steatotic-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/AI-algorithm-accurately-detects-early-stage-metabolic-linked-steatotic-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5e01673-c01b-40ff-8ba3-9124a5c5a0bc Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:24:25 -0500 AI algorithm accurately detects early-stage metabolic-associated steatotic liver disease
新的正念疗法为患有抑郁症的青少年带来了希望研究人员开发了一种专门针对青少年的正念疗法，帮助他们应对日益严重的抑郁症和心理健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-mindativity-therapy-offers-hope-for-teenagers-struggling-with-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-mindativity-therapy-offers-hope-for-teenagers-struggling-with-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4957bb9b-4027-4b7a-b92e-a75037231361 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:16:16 -0500 New mindfulness therapy offers hope for teenagers struggling with depression
研究将大麻的使用与遗传毒性和跨代健康影响联系起来接触大麻会导致遗传损伤和加速衰老，引发人们对其跨代健康影响和公共卫生影响的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Study-links-cannabis-use-to-geno毒性-and-trans Generational-health-impacts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Study-links-cannabis-use-to-geno毒性-and-trans Generational-health-impacts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ad232c9-14a4-4b7a-a772-4453f912f54d Mon, 18 Nov 2024 06:13:00 -0500 Study links cannabis use to genotoxicity and transgenerational health impacts
空气污染导致心力衰竭患者出现炎症盐湖城山间健康中心的心脏研究人员进行的一项新研究发现，心脏病患者，特别是心力衰竭患者，特别容易受到空气污染和空气质量差的影响，可以采取措施保护自己。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Air-pollution-spurs-inflammation-in-heart-failure-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/Air-pollution-spurs-inflammation-in-heart-failure-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9057f5d7-29c2-4662-9ce5-e04ab23a6e5b Mon, 18 Nov 2024 05:55:39 -0500 Air pollution spurs inflammation in heart failure patients
开发出治疗慢性腹痛的新型口服止痛药昆士兰大学的研究人员开发了一种新型口服止痛药，用于抑制慢性腹痛，该药物基于驱动分娩宫缩的肽激素催产素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-oral-painkiller-development-for-chronic-abdominal-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/New-oral-painkiller-development-for-chronic-abdominal-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a3129e3-96a3-49f7-b6fa-1ed6ccf4d769 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 05:48:45 -0500 New oral painkiller developed for chronic abdominal pain
世卫组织领导全球消除宫颈癌随着世界各国领导人抵达巴西里约热内卢参加本周末的 G20 峰会，该市标志性的基督救世主雕像将被点亮为青色。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/WHO-leads-global-push-for-cervical-cancer-elimination.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241118/WHO-leads-global-push-for-cervical-cancer-elimination.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9b3446f-1ca3-4c3e-b234-b4b57e1632e3 Mon, 18 Nov 2024 05:43:16 -0500 WHO leads global push for cervical cancer elimination
